key_risks: Market and economic sensitivity, including real estate market volatility and tenant concentration risk
Regulatory and environmental challenges, particularly around sustainability and carbon emissions compliance
Post-COVID-19 market uncertainty, especially in office leasing
controversies: Related party transactions and potential conflicts of interest
Decision aversion among tenants in the post-pandemic office leasing market
environmental_issues: Increasing environmental regulations requiring significant capital investment for compliance
social_issues: Tenant financial instability impacting rental income
governance_issues: Complexity in managing potential conflicts of interest across multiple fiduciary capacities

sources.title: Navigating Landlord-Tenant Disputes: Legal Rights and Responsibilities
sources.snippet: Landlord-tenant disputes are frustratingly common, impacting property owners, property managers, real estate investors, and tenants alike. queries.rationale: Identify any ongoing or past legal issues that could impact financial stability
Assess compliance with environmental regulations and potential risks from non-compliance
Explore any social or ethical issues arising from tenant relationships or community impact
